phrs.translation: 岩鱼, 石头鱼, 石中怪鱼, 洛菲什
铜石斑鱼, 铜平鲉, 国立水产科学院质量铜

sentences.sentence: The vermilion rockfish has scales on the bottom of the lower jaw which make it rough to the touch.
sentences.translation: 朱石斑鱼有底部的较低的下巴，使其按粗糙的尺度。

sentences.sentence: In the first part, collected rockfish samples monthly by the inshore of Qingdao were measured biologically, then the otolithes were taken and dried.
sentences.translation: 在第一部分中，通过在青岛近海逐月采集许氏平鲉的样品，进行生物学测量，并摘取耳石。

sentences.sentence: And naked mole rats aren't alone in not aging: rockfish, lobsters, and bristlecone pines also seem to stay forever young... or at least forever middle-aged.
sentences.translation: 不会变老的不只有裸鼹鼠：岩鱼龙虾和狐尾松都能永葆青春…要么拥永葆中年。
